entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Clarenville
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:18 PM NDT Thursday 23 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -3.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Terra Nova National Park 7:30 PM NDT Thursday 23 March 2023
Temperature: -3.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.1 kPa rising
Humidity: 77 %
Dewpoint: -6.7°C
Wind: NW 1 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 6 except minus 11 in low lying inland areas.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Low minus 6 except minus 11 in low lying inland areas. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Thursday 23 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Light snow. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy in the morning. Light snow beginning in the afternoon. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming east 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the morning then northeast 40 gusting to 60 in the afternoon. High minus 3. Wind chill near minus 13. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Thursday 23 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. Blowing snow over exposed areas in the evening. Amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind northeast 40 km/h gusting to 60 increasing to 60 gusting to 80 late in the evening. Low minus 4. Wind chill near minus 14. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Thursday 23 March 2023
